text_block_list.text:
I want to teach Twin Turbo a way to victory. 
In order to do that I need to somehow become her trainer.
choice_data_list: Training, are you willing to try it?
Are you willing to take the training?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Training? Don't wanna! 
Turbo don't like being told what to do!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Aah, what a shame, with Turbo's talent with just 
a little training you might be able to win against Teio.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Against Teio!? Really!? 
Then I'll do it!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, good job?

With a witty remark, we somehow managed to get 
started as a duo.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: So, what are we going to do for training?
choice_data_list: First of all, let's check the "running style"

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: running style…?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
In other words, "Runner", "Leader", "Betweener", 
and "Chaser". Which way of running is most 
suitable for Turbo.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
First of all, let's try "Leader" and "Betweener"… 
middle position first. Come on, Turbo!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Turbo, take a position a little in front of me or 
a little behind me! For now, either way is fine!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
A little in front… or a little behind… 
Hmmm…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
(Nature, scary… I'm afraid I'll bump into you if 
I'm by the side… Uh-huu…)

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Uaaaaaaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Eh, wait!?

I tried to make her hold back, but Twin turbo couldn't 
contain herself at all.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Ummm, hello Turbo-san? 
Why……?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Because Turbo can't just stop suddenly! Ehhen!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: No, don't look so proud!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san…
choice_data_list: It's like you get scared of other Horse girl……
You seem to get scared of other Horse girl……

text_block_list.text:
Bravery is the flip side of cowardice. Even during the previous 
mock race, there were signs that she disliked other horse 
girls. It seems that it would be difficult for her to be 
"Leader" or "Betweener".

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
I'm not scared… I just don't like it. 
Well then, Turbo will do another run.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Trainer, do you mean you don't expect it?
choice_data_list: Yeah, because the absolute value of speed is not enough.
That's right, because the absolute value of speed is not enough

text_block_list.text:
This is also evident from the previous mock race. 
In terms of lap time, the three furlongs 
were by far the fastest.

It is impossible to be "Leader", "Betweener", or 
"Chaser". Then, the way forward is…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Ugyaaaaaaaa～～～! 
Ugya gya gya gya gyaaaaa!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Push shu shu shu shu shu shushu～……

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Out of gas!? Again!?

There is no choice but "Runner", but no matter how many times 
she do it, she will go out of control. She's not the type to 
continuously run, and right now she's overwhelmingly lacking 
in stamina.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Hmph mmmmm… Hmph mmmm…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, how many more times 
are we going to do this～!
choice_data_list: We are going to do this all day!

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: mum mum mum…

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Umm, you stop training, what are you doing?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Taiyaki eating game! Do you want to play, Neicha?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
No no no no no!! Because if you don't eat it, 
the taiyaki will get cold and you'll lose.

The only way to strengthen stamina is to keep 
doing steady basic training, but… Twin Turbo got 
bored and quickly threw it away.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Haha, well, don't be so down, trainer. 
You knew she is this way, didn't you?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You see, it's like trying to get a child to eat a vegetable 
they don't like. You have to chop them up into little 
pieces and get them to eat them somehow.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Eh, if it's a Turbo… look, on the course. 
She hate training, but she is not the type to sit still.

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ha～a… ha～a, wheeze…… I can't do it anymore…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
It's painful～, I'm suffocating! 
Haa, ha～a……wheeze……

Seeing the twin turbos practicing on their own, 
I feel something different from before. Even though 
she says it's painful, there's no sign of stopping. Rather…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text: Ugh…… huuuh… haaa…
It even look like she is pushing her limit more and more.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Aah, she doesn't listen to what other people say, 
but if she feel like it she will do something 
until she burn out, she is just that type.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Remember, you saw it right? When she edit video, 
it's the same as that time.

I felt like I saw a faint light in that figure. 
As long as she doesn't dislike running…

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, what are you talking about? 
If it's training I'm not going to do it!
choice_data_list: Let's go on a trip, the three of us

text_block_list.name: Turbo & Nature
text_block_list.text: Ehhhhhhh!?

text_block_list.name: Twin Turbo
text_block_list.text:
A trip! Let's go! Let's go! 
Turbo love to go out and play!

Let's try a "training camp" disguised as a trip. 
We'll see if we can get them to eat their vegetables.
